languages.text: "Амарнат веровал и создал раскол. Тарзус веровал и превратился в фанатика... Вера бывает опасна".
"Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."
languages.original_text: "Амарнат веровал и создал раскол. Тарзус веровал и превратился в фанатика... Вера бывает опасна".

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."
"Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."
"Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."
"Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."
"Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."

languages.text: “阿玛纳特是位信徒，但他却引起了一场分裂。塔祖斯也是位信徒，但他却变成了狂信者……信仰可能会很危险。”
languages.original_text: "Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: “阿玛纳特是位信徒，但他却引起了一场分裂。塔祖斯也是位信徒，但他却变成了狂信者……信仰可能会很危险。”

languages.text: «Amarnat era creyente y causó un cisma. Tarzus era creyente y se convirtió en un fanático... La fe puede ser peligrosa».
languages.original_text: "Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: «Amarnat era creyente y causó un cisma. Tarzus era creyente y se convirtió en un fanático... La fe puede ser peligrosa».

languages.text: 「アマルナトは信徒であったが、分裂を引き起こした。ターザスは信徒であったが、狂信者となった…信仰は危険なものだ」
languages.original_text: "Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: 「アマルナトは信徒であったが、分裂を引き起こした。ターザスは信徒であったが、狂信者となった…信仰は危険なものだ」

languages.text: "Amarnat war ein Gläubiger, und er hat eine Spaltung ausgelöst. Tarzus war ein Gläubiger, und er hat sich in einen Fanatiker verwandelt ... Glaube kann gefährlich sein."
languages.original_text: "Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat war ein Gläubiger, und er hat eine Spaltung ausgelöst. Tarzus war ein Gläubiger, und er hat sich in einen Fanatiker verwandelt ... Glaube kann gefährlich sein."

languages.text: « Amarnat était un fidèle, et il a provoqué un schisme. Tarzus était un fidèle, et il s'est transformé en fanatique... La foi peut s'avérer dangereuse. »
languages.original_text: "Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: « Amarnat était un fidèle, et il a provoqué un schisme. Tarzus était un fidèle, et il s'est transformé en fanatique... La foi peut s'avérer dangereuse. »

languages.text: "Amarnat inançlıydı, bölünmeye neden oldu. Tarzus inançlıydu, yobaza dönüştü. İnanç tehlikeli olabiliyor."
languages.original_text: "Amarnat was a believer, and he caused a schism. Tarzus was a believer, and he turned into a zealot... Faith can be dangerous."

traits.locale_text: "Amarnat inançlı biriydi ve bölünmeye neden oldu. Tarzus inançlı biriydi ve bir yobaza dönüştü. İnanç tehlikeli olabiliyor."
